CHAT.comment: DANIEL B. LOCKE, ET AL. Petitioners v. EDWARD A. KARASS, STATE CONTROLLER, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:08 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF W. JAMES YOUNG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEREMIAH A. COLLINS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF W. JAMES YOUNG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:08 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
